item.content:encoded:
First of all, put your phone in another room.

It’s a device made exactly to keep you occupied.

We’ve got work to do!

But where?…

Change up your old and boring environment.

Go to the kitchen, Starbucks, outside or I don’t care.

It will keep you away from old bad habits that come from pesky little associations.

So, keep your bed for sleep.

Obviously, you know when to do that as you will…

…allocate time for EVERY task.

Become a TERMINATOR and eliminate everything you need to do in a day.

You’ll also become better at estimating time frames

PLUS you’ll not waste time such as…

…such as with social media.

Don’t scroll Instagram, not even in your breaks.

That shit fries your brain, like an egg in a pan.

Omelet brain lol
